outline:
1. seat, assembly, dwelling-place, dwelling, dwellers
    1. seat, sitting, those sitting, sitting company or assembly
    2. dwelling place, dwelling
    3. situation, location
    4. time of dwelling
    5. those dwelling, dweller
kjv_def: assembly, dwell in, dwelling(-place), wherein (that) dwelt (in), inhabited place, seat, sitting, situation, sojourning.
strongs_def: a seat; figuratively, a site; abstractly, a session; by extension an abode (the place or the time); by implication, population
